title: Pie Earrings | Blueberry Pie Drop Dangle Earrings Gift for Thanksgiving
features: Silver stainless steel, lead and nickel free
description: Look cute in these blueberry pie earrings, with this handcrafted artisan jewelry that will make you a true foodie. Nothing hit’s the spot quite like the aroma of home cooking and helping grandma make her scrumptious pie recipe. Food is more than just a meal, it’s time spent cooking together, eating together and creating bonds over a dinning room table.  As artisans, we hand-make each earrings personally with care and attention, to reflect the value of those joyful moments we share over a meal. Gifts that carry a story should be made with love, so we never outsource our products to a cheap over-sea’s factory.   Our handcrafted charms are vibrant and realistic, and are carefully clasped to a silver earring hook. They’re made from durable clay, coated with color-fading paint, and sealed with non-toxic vanish. Our non-corrosive earring hooks are stainless steel, and are lead and nickel free to avoid allergies for those with sensitive ears. Avoid water and sleeping in them to improve the longevity of the jewelry. Each earring pair comes displayed on a custom backing, and wrapped in a protective crystal clear sleeve for protection and the easy of wrapping and gift giving.
